categories.description: High-level orchestration: job planning, costing, recommendations, what-if, diagnosis
Graph queries, federated corrections, training lessons, genome fingerprints
4 product tiers: speed-feed calculator, post-processor, shop manager, auto-CNC
Live machine state, sensor feedback, maintenance prediction, Industry 4.0
CAM systems, DNC transfer, ERP work orders, CMM measurement, mobile interface
Root cause analysis, failure forensics, sustainability optimization, process generation
Conversation state, onboarding, skills, intent parsing, formatting, workflows

decomposition_boundaries.rationale: 4 product tiers are self-contained with own ProductEngine variants, already have separate UI routes
Real-time machine state + adaptive control + maintenance forms natural IoT subsystem
CAM/DNC/ERP/Measurement/Mobile are 5 distinct external system integrations
Graph + federated + apprentice + genome form knowledge management subsystem
Inverse solving + forensics + sustainability + generative process share analysis patterns
All user interaction, memory, formatting engines -- could split further
Keep as prism_intelligence -- the orchestration layer that composes other engines

findings.finding: 7 natural decomposition boundaries identified with roughly equal sizes (11-42 actions each)
No category depends on another category's internal state -- clean boundaries
Product actions (40) already have dedicated UI routes, strongest split candidate
External integration (42) is the largest category -- 5 distinct external systems
